attributes.contentHtml:
Falixx Its hard for many hosts. And they just started and we are still learning and starting and we can’t take this. You guys make many small/new hosts quit.

It wouldn't be hard if they took it seriously, if they assure quality before going public, if they're sure that they're not doing anything wrong, have all the legal documents in place, etc.

attributes.bio:
Papi Jedrik — 07/29/2021
I can't handle this community anymore, it was fun at the start with winterhoax, i'll save you the hassle, i'm resigning

Sloth — 07/29/2021
my thoughts exactly

attributes.contentHtml: Jedrik You gust harras them into shutting down, they cannot do anything, they add TOS, but still you guys join, asking for the nodes specs again & again, even if it's resolved, there is nothing they can do.
